item.title: Jonas Brothers - Cool - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, F, C
As performed by The Jonas Brothers.
Clean version by Polar Records (https://youtu.be/Q0UKO2R4yno)
See the tutorial video (GCEA): https://youtu.be/yMcpcayqDpI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. Background motion video from motionbolt.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Jonas Brothers - Cool - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, F, C
As performed by The Jonas Brothers.
Clean version by Polar Records (https://youtu.be/Q0UKO2R4yno)
See the tutorial video (GCEA): https://youtu.be/yMcpcayqDpI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is custom made (calligraphr.com), based on Chordette for Education (available at ukefarm.com). The motion background video is from motionbolt.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.
